HW15
Give the domain and range of the multivariable function.

${f(x,y)= \sqrt{9-x^2-y^2}}$ 

 * Domain = ${0 \leq{9-x^2-y^2}}$ 
 * D = {$(x,y):{{x^2-y^2}\leq9}$}
 * Range  = [0, 9]
